rules_text: [i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)[/i]
special_text:
I – Create a 1/1 red Hound creature token.
II – Create a 4/4 green Rhino Warrior creature token with trample.
III – You may have two target creatures you control fight. If you do and exactly one survives, put four +1/+1 counters on that creature.
